title: The Spirit of St. Louis
writer: Charles A. Lindbergh (based on the book by), Billy Wilder (screen play by), Wendell Mayes (screen play by), Charles Lederer (adaptation)
actors: James Stewart, Murray Hamilton, Patricia Smith, Bartlett Robinson
plot: Biography of Charles Lindburgh from his days of precarious mail runs in aviation's infancy to his design of a small transatlantic plane and the vicissitudes of its takeoff and epochal flight from New York to Paris in 1927.
name: The Spirit of St. Louis
